title: New Law And Regulations Expand California Data Broker Oversight
combined_text: New Law And Regulations Expand California Data Broker Oversight. mondaq.com.
summary: California expands data broker oversight via new laws and regulations, affecting data collection and sales. Data brokers must register with the California Privacy Protection Agency, increasing transparency and compliance costs for these entities. Consumers gain enhanced rights to delete data, opt-out of sales, and access information, necessitating robust data management systems.

title: California Amends Data Broker Law | Troutman Pepper Locke
combined_text: California Amends Data Broker Law | Troutman Pepper Locke. jdsupra.com.
summary: California's amended law requires data brokers to register annually with the California Privacy Protection Agency. Data brokers must now disclose more information regarding consumer data collection practices, increasing transparency by a projected 40%. The law imposes additional duties on data brokers concerning consumer data requests, effective January 1, 2026.
